kvTags.description: The service tag dictionary. Tags are mutable.

location.description: The name of the Azure location/region.

name.description: Name of the Azure Machine Learning service.

properties.description: The service properties dictionary. Properties are immutable.

appInsightsEnabled.description: Whether or not Application Insights is enabled.

authEnabled.description: Whether or not authentication is enabled on the service.

containerResourceRequirements.description: The resource requirements for the container (cpu and memory).

dataCollection.description: Details of the data collection options specified.

dnsNameLabel.description: The Dns label for the service.

sslCertificate.description: The public SSL certificate in PEM format to use if SSL is enabled.

sslEnabled.description: Whether or not SSL is enabled.

sslKey.description: The public SSL key in PEM format for the certificate.

ACIServiceCreateRequestDataCollection.description: Details of the data collection options specified.

subnetName.description: The name of the virtual network subnet.

vnetName.description: The name of the virtual network.

AKS.description: A Machine Learning compute based on AKS.

dnsServiceIP.description: An IP address assigned to the Kubernetes DNS service. It must be within the Kubernetes service address range specified in serviceCidr.

dockerBridgeCidr.description: A CIDR notation IP range assigned to the Docker bridge network. It must not overlap with any Subnet IP ranges or the Kubernetes service address range.

serviceCidr.description: A CIDR notation IP range from which to assign service cluster IPs. It must not overlap with any Subnet IP ranges.

subnetId.description: Virtual network subnet resource ID the compute nodes belong to

aadAuthEnabled.description: Whether or not AAD authentication is enabled.

appInsightsEnabled.description: Whether or not Application Insights is enabled.

authEnabled.description: Whether or not authentication is enabled.

computeName.description: The name of the compute resource.

containerResourceRequirements.description: The resource requirements for the container (cpu and memory).

dataCollection.description: Details of the data collection options specified.

maxConcurrentRequestsPerContainer.description: The maximum number of concurrent requests per container.

maxQueueWaitMs.description: Maximum time a request will wait in the queue (in milliseconds). After this time, the service will return 503 (Service Unavailable)

numReplicas.description: The number of replicas on the cluster.

AKSServiceCreateRequest.description: The request to create an AKS service.

maxReplicas.description: The maximum number of replicas in the cluster.

minReplicas.description: The minimum number of replicas to scale down to.

refreshPeriodInSeconds.description: The amount of seconds to wait between auto scale updates.

targetUtilization.description: The target utilization percentage to use for determining whether to scale the cluster.

AKSServiceCreateRequestDataCollection.description: Details of the data collection options specified.

failureThreshold.description: The number of failures to allow before returning an unhealthy status.

initialDelaySeconds.description: The delay before the first probe in seconds.

periodSeconds.description: The length of time between probes in seconds.

successThreshold.description: The number of successful probes before returning a healthy status.

enableNodePublicIp.description: Enable or disable node public IP address provisioning. Possible values are: Possible values are: true - Indicates that the compute nodes will have public IPs provisioned. false - Indicates that the compute nodes will have a private endpoint and no public IPs.

remoteLoginPortPublicAccess.description: State of the public SSH port. Possible values are: Disabled - Indicates that the public ssh port is closed on all nodes of the cluster. Enabled - Indicates that the public ssh port is open on all nodes of the cluster. NotSpecified - Indicates that the public ssh port is closed on all nodes of the cluster if VNet is defined, else is open all public nodes. It can be default only during cluster creation time, after creation it will be either enabled or disabled.

subnet.description: Represents a resource ID. For example, for a subnet, it is the resource URL for the subnet.

userAccountCredentials.description: Settings for user account that gets created on each on the nodes of a compute.

virtualMachineImage.description: Virtual Machine image for Windows AML Compute

AssignedUser.description: A user that can be assigned to a compute instance.

description.description: The description of the Machine Learning compute.

resourceId.description: ARM resource id of the underlying compute

ComputeInstance.description: An Azure Machine Learning compute instance.

applicationSharingPolicy.description: Policy for sharing applications on this compute instance among users of parent workspace. If Personal, only the creator can access applications on this compute instance. When Shared, any workspace user can access applications on this instance depending on his/her assigned role.

computeInstanceAuthorizationType.description: The Compute Instance Authorization type. Available values are personal (default).

personalComputeInstanceSettings.description: Settings for a personal compute instance.

setupScripts.description: Details of customized scripts to execute for setting up the cluster.

sshSettings.description: Specifies policy and settings for SSH access.

subnet.description: Represents a resource ID. For example, for a subnet, it is the resource URL for the subnet.

adminPublicKey.description: Specifies the SSH rsa public key file as a string. Use "ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 2048" to generate your SSH key pairs.

sshPublicAccess.description: State of the public SSH port. Possible values are: Disabled - Indicates that the public ssh port is closed on this instance. Enabled - Indicates that the public ssh port is open and accessible according to the VNet/subnet policy if applicable.

ComputeInstanceSshSettings.description: Specifies policy and settings for SSH access.

cpu.description: The number of CPU cores on the container.

fpga.description: The number of FPGA PCIE devices exposed to the container. Must be multiple of 2.

gpu.description: The number of GPU cores in the container.

memoryInGB.description: The amount of memory on the container in GB.

ContainerResourceRequirements.description: The resource requirements for the container (cpu and memory).

trafficPercentile.description: The amount of traffic variant receives.

driverProgram.description: The name of the driver file.

environment.description: The details of the AZURE ML environment.

environmentReference.description: The unique identifying details of the AZURE ML environment.

CreateServiceRequestEnvironmentImageRequ.description: The Environment, models and assets needed for inferencing.

id.description: The id of the dataset reference.

name.description: The name of the dataset reference.

status.description: Indicates whether or not the encryption is enabled for the workspace.

docker.description: The definition of a Docker container.

environmentVariables.description: Definition of environment variables to be defined in the environment.

inferencingStackVersion.description: The inferencing stack version added to the image. To avoid adding an inferencing stack, do not set this value. Valid values: "latest".

name.description: The name of the environment.

spark.description: The configuration for a Spark environment.

EnvironmentImageRequestEnvironment.description: The details of the AZURE ML environment.

name.description: Name of the environment.

EnvironmentImageRequestEnvironmentRefere.description: The unique identifying details of the AZURE ML environment.

address.description: Public IP address of the master node of the cluster.

sshPort.description: Port open for ssh connections on the master node of the cluster.

userAssignedIdentities.description: dictionary containing all the user assigned identities, with resourceId of the UAI as key.

identityClientId.description: For future use - The client id of the identity which will be used to access key vault.

keyIdentifier.description: Key vault uri to access the encryption key.

keyVaultArmId.description: The ArmId of the keyVault where the customer owned encryption key is present.

allowMultiSelect.description: Indicates whether it is allowed to select multiple classes in this category.

classes.description: Dictionary of label classes in this category.

displayName.description: Display name of the label category.

LabelCategory.description: Represents a category of labels in a labeling job.

displayName.description: Display name of the label class.

subclasses.description: Dictionary of subclasses of the label class.

LabelClass.description: Represents a label or a category of labels in a labeling job.

assetName.description: Name of the data asset to perform labeling.

enableIncrementalDatasetRefresh.description: Indicates whether to enable incremental dataset refresh.

LabelingDatasetConfiguration.description: Represents configuration of dataset used in a labeling job.

additionalProperties.description: Unmatched properties from the message are deserialized this collection

annotationType.description: Annotation type of image labeling tasks.

LabelingJobImageProperties.description: Properties in an labeling job of image media.

uri.description: The link to a page with detailed labeling instructions for labelers.

datasetConfiguration.description: Represents configuration of dataset used in a labeling job.

labelingJobMediaProperties.description: Properties in an labeling job of image media.

mlAssistConfiguration.description: Represents configuration for machine learning assisted features in a labeling job.

properties.description: The job property dictionary. Properties can be added, but not removed or altered.

tags.description: The job tag dictionary. Tags can be added, removed, and updated.

createdTime.description: The creation time of the linked service.

linkedServiceResourceId.description: ResourceId of the link target of the linked service.

modifiedTime.description: The last modified time of the linked service.

mlAssistEnabled.description: Indicates whether MLAssist feature is enabled.

modelNamePrefix.description: Name prefix to use for machine learning model. For each iteration modelName will be appended with iteration e.g.{modelName}_{i}.

prelabelAccuracyThreshold.description: Prelabel accuracy threshold used in MLAssist feature.

MLAssistConfiguration.description: Represents configuration for machine learning assisted features in a labeling job.

datasets.description: The list of datasets associated with the model.

experimentName.description: The name of the experiment where this model was created.

kvTags.description: The Model tag dictionary. Items are mutable.

mimeType.description: The MIME type of Model content. For more details about MIME type, please open https://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml

name.description: The Model name.

properties.description: The Model property dictionary. Properties are immutable.

resourceRequirements.description: The resource requirements for the container (cpu and memory).

runId.description: The RunId that created this model.

sampleInputData.description: Sample Input Data for the Model. A reference to a dataset in the workspace in the format aml://dataset/{datasetId}

sampleOutputData.description: Sample Output Data for the Model. A reference to a dataset in the workspace in the format aml://dataset/{datasetId}

unpack.description: Indicates whether we need to unpack the Model during docker Image creation.

url.description: The URL of the Model. Usually a SAS URL.

version.description: The Model version assigned by Model Management Service.

ModelDockerSectionBaseImageRegistry.description: Image registry that contains the base image.

baseDockerfile.description: Base Dockerfile used for Docker-based runs. Mutually exclusive with BaseImage.

baseImage.description: Base image used for Docker-based runs. Mutually exclusive with BaseDockerfile.

baseImageRegistry.description: Image registry that contains the base image.

ModelEnvironmentDefinitionDocker.description: The definition of a Docker container.

interpreterPath.description: The python interpreter path to use if an environment build is not required. The path specified gets used to call the user script.

userManagedDependencies.description: True means that AzureML reuses an existing python environment; False means that AzureML will create a python environment based on the Conda dependencies specification.

rscriptPath.description:
The Rscript path to use if an environment build is not required.
The path specified gets used to call the user script.

rVersion.description: The version of R to be installed

snapshotDate.description: Date of MRAN snapshot to use in YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. "2019-04-17"

userManaged.description: Indicates whether the environment is managed by user or by AzureML.

ModelEnvironmentDefinitionSpark.description: The configuration for a Spark environment.

assignedUser.description: A user that can be assigned to a compute instance.

PersonalComputeInstanceSettings.description: Settings for a personal compute instance.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the private endpoint connection resource.

actionsRequired.description: A message indicating if changes on the service provider require any updates on the consumer.

description.description: The reason for approval/rejection of the connection.

status.description: Indicates whether the connection has been Approved/Rejected/Removed by the owner of the service.

PrivateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

name.description: The package name.

ResourceId.description: Represents a resource ID. For example, for a subnet, it is the resource URL for the subnet.

authToken.description: Personal access token to install from a private repo

repository.description: Repository address in the format username/repo[/subdir][@ref|#pull].

maxNodeCount.description: Max number of nodes to use

minNodeCount.description: Min number of nodes to use

nodeIdleTimeBeforeScaleDown.description: Node Idle Time before scaling down amlCompute. This string needs to be in the RFC Format.

scriptArguments.description: Optional command line arguments passed to the script to run.

scriptData.description: The location of scripts in the mounted volume.

scriptSource.description: The storage source of the script: inline, workspace.

timeout.description: Optional time period passed to timeout command.

SetupScripts.description: Details of customized scripts to execute for setting up the cluster.

name.description: Unique name of the private link.

properties.description: Properties of a shared private link resource.

groupId.description: The private link resource group id.

privateLinkResourceId.description: The resource id that private link links to.

status.description: Indicates whether the connection has been Approved/Rejected/Removed by the owner of the service.

SharedPrivateLinkResourceProperty.description: Properties of a shared private link resource.

name.description: Name of the sku

tier.description: Tier of the sku like Basic or Enterprise

status.description: Enable or disable ssl for scoring.

adminUserName.description: Name of the administrator user account which can be used to SSH to nodes.

adminUserPassword.description: Password of the administrator user account.

adminUserSshPublicKey.description: SSH public key of the administrator user account.

UserAccountCredentials.description: Settings for user account that gets created on each on the nodes of a compute.

VirtualMachine.description: A Machine Learning compute based on Azure Virtual Machines.

VirtualMachineImage.description: Virtual Machine image for Windows AML Compute

address.description: Public IP address of the virtual machine.

authType.description: Authorization type of the workspace connection.

value.description: Value details of the workspace connection.

allowPublicAccessWhenBehindVnet.description: The flag to indicate whether to allow public access when behind VNet.

applicationInsights.description: ARM id of the application insights associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created

containerRegistry.description: ARM id of the container registry associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created

discoveryUrl.description: Url for the discovery service to identify regional endpoints for machine learning experimentation services

friendlyName.description: The friendly name for this workspace. This name in mutable

hbiWorkspace.description: The flag to signal HBI data in the workspace and reduce diagnostic data collected by the service

imageBuildCompute.description: The compute name for image build

keyVault.description: ARM id of the key vault associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created

sharedPrivateLinkResources.description: The list of shared private link resources in this workspace.

storageAccount.description: ARM id of the storage account associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created

WorkspaceProperties.description: The properties of a machine learning workspace.
